markdownRemark.html:
Imagine Llama yawaning

created with fal.ai

The Scared Llama appeares

Default notion urls have a very interesting naming convention. They use two unrealated words, randomly I guess, and somehow it makes perfect sense. That's what happened when I published a page back in November. That's how the Scared Llama appeared.

Other randomest names that I could find as notion urls
  • enormous-terrier
  • (will upadate this list as I recall)

That's all for now, I'm sure I'll try to write more interesting things in the future.

Using MDX to write this, still trying to get the hang of the formating
